award_title: CAREER: Impacts of Environmental Filtering versus Species Interactions on Persistence and Coexistence in a Warming World
subject: Re: analysis pipelines that only the original grad student can run
body:
Training rotating students to run the same demographic model + data preprocessing workflow consistently is brutal. Scripts that made sense last field season become mysteries by next summer.

Built Ouro so computational methods are citable and reusableâ€”pipelines people can actually find and use, not just read about in methods sections.

Happy to show you. Buried until January? Just ping me then.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
